edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.reason.common

Class ContextMinimizingReasonerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.reason.common.ContextMinimizingReasonerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReasonerFactory

    public class ContextMinimizingReasonerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReasonerFactory
    A factory for producing instances of ContextMinimizingReasoner.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContextMinimizingReasonerFactory(PreUniverse universe, TheoremProverFactory proverFactory, SimplifierFactory simplifierFactory)
      Creates new factory based on the given symbolic universe, theorem prover factory, and simplifier factory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContextMinimizingReasonerFactory

        public ContextMinimizingReasonerFactory(PreUniverse universe,
                                TheoremProverFactory proverFactory,
                                SimplifierFactory simplifierFactory)
        Creates new factory based on the given symbolic universe, theorem prover factory, and simplifier factory. Those objects will be used by the reasoners produced by this factory.
        Parameters:
        universe - symbolic universe used to produce new symbolic expressions
        proverFactory - used to produce new TheoremProvers, which will be used by the reasoners to check validity
        simplifierFactory - used to produce new Simplifiers, which will be used by the reasoners to simplify expressions

    • Method Detail

      • getReasoner

        public ContextMinimizingReasoner getReasoner(BooleanExpression context)
        Description copied from interface: ReasonerFactory
        Gets a Reasoner for the given context. If this method is called twice with two contexts that are equal (according to method SymbolicObject.equals(Object)), the second call may return the same instance as the first call (i.e., the factory may cache the results).
        Specified by:
        getReasoner in interface ReasonerFactory
        Parameters:
        context - a non-null boolean expression to be used as the context for the Reasoner
        Returns:
        a Reasoner based on the given context
